titleStmt.title: The declaration of Captain Alexander Charters brother of the house of Aimsfield / written and subscribed by himself in prison, and delivered, and read publickly at his execution at Edinburgh, the 21. of June, 1650 ...
titleStmt.author: Charters, Alexander, d. 1650.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
